properties.description: Pipeline for enriching data from DimCustomer with additional location information from an external data source.

activities.name: Enrich Customer Data
activities.description: Data flow that enriches the data from the DimCustomer table with location information from an external data source. The enriched data is then copied to a staging table in Azure Synapse Analytics.

activities.name: Import Customer dimension
activities.description: Copies Customer data from files stored in a data lake, renames columns, and inserts the data into a staging version of the DimCustomer table in Azure Synapse Analytics.

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Import WWI Perf Data - Fact Sale Fast')]
[concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Import WWI Perf Data - Fact Sale Slow')]

schema.name: Stock Holding Key|Stock Item Key|Quantity On Hand|Bin Location|Last Stocktake Quantity|Last Cost Price|Reorder Level|Target Stock Level|Lineage Key

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	UniqueId as string
}
source(output(
		City as string,
		State as string,
		Zip as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Timezone as short,
		DST as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PostalCodes
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		WWICustomerID as integer,
		Customer as string,
		BillToCustomer as string,
		Category as string,
		BuyingGroup as string,
		PrimaryContact as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		LineageKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimCustomer
PostalCodes filter(and(
    greaterOrEqual(toInteger(Zip), 90000),
    lesserOrEqual(toInteger(Zip), 98000)
)) ~> PostalCodeFilter
DimCustomer, PostalCodeFilter join(PostalCode == Zip,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOnPostalCode
JoinOnPostalCode select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		WWICustomerID,
		Customer,
		BillToCustomer,
		Category,
		BuyingGroup,
		PrimaryContact,
		PostalCode,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		LineageKey,
		City,
		State,
		Latitude,
		Longitude,
		Timezone,
		DST
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDesiredColumns
SelectDesiredColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EnrichedCustomerData
SelectDesiredColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concat('enrichedcustomer_', $UniqueId, '.parquet'))],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> EnrichedCustomerDataAdls
